title: [Self-Directed] Understanding and Practicing Academic Integrity in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and understanding of basic academic norms
context.additional_context: Education for professionals to recognize the importance of online academic integrity while enhancing science-related job competencies using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three concepts of academic integrity in online environments
Learners can analyze online survey results to compare differences in learner perceptions
Learners can present at least two online academic integrity guidelines linked to real-world job situations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
